data.title: Orlando Loredo
data.meta_description: With a Bachelor of Arts in Broadcast Journalism from The University of Texas-Pan American and a background in Radio and Television from The University of Texas at Austin, this professional has a strong foundation in media. They have held roles such as Editor at ABC News, Founder/Developer at matchcut.io, and Television Editor at Meg Tv. Their experience also includes freelance work as a Film & TV Editor and Director, showcasing their versatility and creativity. They have contributed to projects for well-known companies like NBCUniversal, A+E Networks, Bloomberg Philanthropies, and BET Networks. Their expertise lies in video editing, directing, and producing, with a keen eye for storytelling and a strong understanding of the technical aspects of media production.
